name: Puzzle
tagline: Tool Support for Language Product Lines Engineering
body:
### Welcome to Puzzle.
Puzzle is a tool-supported approach for Language Product Lines Engineering.

### Designer Templates
We’ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.


### Authors and Contributors
[David Méndez Acuña](http://damenac.snack.ws/)
José A. Galindo

### Support or Contact
Interested? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
